attributes.additional_details: This action will allow individuals who object under the auspices of an Act of Parliament in the UK, or under English Law to being vaccinated, for any reason - e.g. infringement of their rights protected elsewhere under the law or on medical, religious, moral, philosophical or other grounds - to be treated in the same way as individuals who have freely chosen to be vaccinated against the COVID-19 virus, or any other disease.
attributes.background: Allow individuals with Covid neutralizing antibodies and T-cells (or neutralizing antibodies and T-cells in the context of other diseases) developed through natural infection to be afforded equal status to those individuals who have developed immunity by vaccination.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580974
